roleset.name: harmed or spoiled

example.name: Arg1 only
example.text: I stop the multivitamin and my mouth symptoms are gone , sadly my eyesight is still damaged .

example.name: Both args
example.text: The spinal cord is damaged from the impact of the disk contacting the spinal cord.
example.arg: from the impact of the disk contacting the spinal cord.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. Based on verb entry damage.01, but differs in that adj lacks arg2, which doesn't seem grammatical with adjective usages.
